tasks.name: Streaming core implementation
tasks.description: Port CDP streaming + screenshot sampler + /healthz plumbing into gsd-browser.
acceptance_criteria: Env toggles enable CDP vs screenshot mode with quality presets.
ScreenshotManager stores sampled frames with metadata.
/healthz returns latency/drop stats from new emitters.

API key + nonce handshake enforced in log server.
